validationRules.block_id: Required - Unique identifier for the block
validationRules.Alignment.md: left, center, or right - Controls content alignment
validationRules.Title: Required - The info box heading text
validationRules.Description: Required - The info box description/content text
validationRules.IconName: Required when iconType='icon' - FontAwesome class (e.g., 'fas fa-rocket')
validationRules.textIcon: Required when iconType='text' - Text to display (e.g., '01', 'A')
validationRules.imageName.url: Required when iconType='image' - URL to uploaded image
validationRules.svgIcon.url: Required when iconType='svg' - URL to custom SVG file
validationRules.imageSize: WordPress image size when iconType='image' (thumbnail, medium, large, full)
validationRules.IBoxLinkTgl: Boolean - Makes entire info box clickable when true
validationRules.iboxcarousel: Array of info box objects when layoutType='carousel'
validationRules.iboxcarousel[]._key: Required - Unique key for each carousel item
validationRules.carouselBtn: Boolean - Display button inside carousel items

warnings: ‚ö†Ô∏è iconType must match icon source: 'icon' needs IconName, 'text' needs textIcon, 'image' needs imageName.url
‚ö†Ô∏è dispPinText requires pinText to display the badge (badge won't show without text)
‚ö†Ô∏è IBoxLinkTgl makes entire box clickable - ensure clear visual indication (hover effect)
‚ö†Ô∏è layoutType='carousel' requires iboxcarousel array with at least 1 item
‚ö†Ô∏è Each iboxcarousel item requires unique _key value (use '0', '1', '2', etc.)
‚ö†Ô∏è styleType affects layout: style-1 (vertical), style-2 (horizontal), style-3 (with border)
‚ö†Ô∏è Alignment works differently on style-3 (affects border position too)
‚ö†Ô∏è Large image icons (imageName) should be optimized (<100KB recommended)
‚ö†Ô∏è Text icons (textIcon) work best with 1-3 characters (longer text may not fit)
‚ö†Ô∏è IBoxLink with target='_blank' should include nofollow for external links (SEO)
‚ö†Ô∏è Pin badges position may vary by style - test on all style types
commonMistakes: ‚ùå Using IconName when iconType='text' (icon won't show, need textIcon instead)
‚ùå Setting dispPinText=true without pinText (empty badge appears)
‚ùå Using iboxcarousel array when layoutType='listing' (array ignored)
‚ùå Forgetting _key property on carousel items (React rendering issues)
‚ùå Using duplicate _key values in carousel items (only one item renders)
‚ùå Setting IBoxLinkTgl=false while configuring IBoxLink.url (link ignored)
‚ùå Using very long textIcon (>5 characters) that overflows container
‚ùå Not optimizing image icons (large files cause slow loading)
‚ùå Using target='_blank' for internal links (creates bad UX)
‚ùå Setting carouselBtn=true when layoutType='listing' (button won't appear)
‚ùå Forgetting to provide Title or Description (info box appears incomplete)
‚ùå Using wrong iconType for source (e.g., iconType='image' but providing IconName)
bestPractices: ‚úÖ Use iconType='icon' for standard features (fast, wide icon library)
‚úÖ Use iconType='text' for numbered steps or labeled categories (01, 02, A, B)
‚úÖ Use iconType='image' for brand logos or custom illustrations (unique graphics)
‚úÖ Keep Title concise (2-5 words) for better readability
‚úÖ Keep Description to 2-3 sentences (50-100 words) for scannable content
‚úÖ Use dispPinText for highlighting new, premium, or important features
‚úÖ Use IBoxLinkTgl sparingly - not all info boxes need to be clickable
‚úÖ Apply center alignment for standalone feature boxes, left for list-style layouts
‚úÖ Use style-1 for vertical icon-above-text layouts (most common)
‚úÖ Use style-2 for horizontal icon-left, text-right layouts (space-efficient)
‚úÖ Use style-3 for elegant presentations with decorative border accents
‚úÖ Group 3-4 info boxes in a row for feature grids (use tp-column)
‚úÖ Use layoutType='carousel' for testimonials or rotating feature showcases
‚úÖ Provide 3-5 carousel items for good rotation variety (not too few/many)
‚úÖ Optimize image icons: max 200x200px, compressed, SVG preferred
‚úÖ Use consistent iconType across multiple boxes for visual harmony
‚úÖ Test clickable boxes (IBoxLinkTgl) on mobile - ensure easy tapping
‚úÖ Use descriptive pin badge text ('New', 'Premium', 'Hot') not generic ('Info')
‚úÖ Match info box styling to overall site design (colors, fonts, spacing)

responsivePatterns: üì± Test alignment on mobile - centered boxes may look better left-aligned on small screens
üì± Reduce icon sizes on mobile if using large custom images
üì± Consider stacking info boxes vertically on mobile (even in style-2)
üì± Ensure clickable boxes (IBoxLinkTgl) have adequate touch target size (44px+)
üì± Pin badges may need repositioning on mobile - test corner placement
üì± Shorter Description text on mobile for better scanability
üì± Carousel navigation buttons should be easily tappable on mobile (larger hit area)
üì± Test text icon readability on mobile (may need larger size)
üì± Reduce Description length or use ellipsis on mobile to prevent overflow
üì± Test style-2 horizontal layout on mobile - may need to switch to style-1 (vertical)
accessibilityNotes: ‚ôø Icons are decorative - Title and Description provide actual content
‚ôø Ensure clickable boxes (IBoxLinkTgl) have visible focus states for keyboard nav
‚ôø Pin badges should supplement, not replace main content
‚ôø Use descriptive Title text - screen readers announce this as heading
‚ôø Ensure color contrast of 4.5:1 minimum for text (WCAG AA)
‚ôø Icon-only content is inaccessible - always provide Title + Description
‚ôø Carousel controls need keyboard accessibility (arrow keys, Tab navigation)
‚ôø Test with screen readers to verify proper announcement order
‚ôø Links (IBoxLink) should have descriptive text, not just 'Click here'
‚ôø Ensure hover effects don't hide critical information
performanceConsiderations: ‚ö° FontAwesome icons add ~70KB if not already loaded (iconType='icon')
‚ö° Image icons should be optimized: <100KB, compressed, proper dimensions
‚ö° SVG icons are smallest and scalable - preferred over PNG/JPG
‚ö° Carousel mode adds slider JavaScript - test load time with many items
‚ö° Clickable boxes (IBoxLinkTgl) add <a> wrapper - minimal performance impact
‚ö° Multiple info boxes on page (3-9 typical) have cumulative rendering cost
‚ö° Large Description text increases DOM size - keep concise
‚ö° Pin badges add extra DOM nodes - minimal impact
‚ö° Style-2 and style-3 have slightly more CSS - negligible difference
‚ö° Test scroll performance with many info boxes (20+) on same page
